txt.en: Hides can be found on some large game in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should collect hides.
A storage crate can be found in either Trader's Wharf or Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should place the hides in a storage crate.
Place the hides in a storage crate
Someone has posted a task to collect hides in the Wildwood.
The bulletin notice reads:\n\n'Needed: Hides from the Wildwood for craft and trade. You will be rewarded for your efforts.'
